column3: Representativeness of the exposed cohort (with prior subarachnoid haemorrhage)
column4: Selection of the non-exposed cohort (without prior subarachnoid haemorrhage)
column6: Demonstration that outcome of interest (aneurysmal rupture of observed aneurysm) was not present at start of study
column7: Does the study consider and/or reports outcomes for stratified aneurysm sizes under 10 mm
column8: Does the study consider/report outcomes for any additional factor (eg hypertension or smoking status or aneurysm morphology or aneurysm location)
column9: How was the outcome ie rupture of the observed aneurysm verified?
column10: Was follow-up long enough for outcomes to occur, ie is mean follow up is >12 YEARS?
column11: How complete was the follow up?

column1: Fill in 1 into the Excel cell if a starred item is chosen during scoring, otherwise choose 0. leave no blanks
